column4: hello, how do i write in the hardrive locations adress bar in ubuntu? in early versions there was a pencil icon that allowed me to write, but how do i do it in version 10.04?
but is possible to write without the pencil, with some shortcurt of some sort?
i don't really need the pencil, just any way to write/copy/cut the information on the hardrive adress bar on file browser
I kow what you mean, but how I use it (I still do, I have Debian right now) is using that pencil thing.
well, my debian was installed around one year ago. I do the updates all right, but I'm not very keen on upgrades. So I have to check.
